name: fullstack-evals-harness-example
description: Lightweight eval harness for running AI graders against test cases
author: Johnny Dunn

scripts.dev: concurrently -n be,fe -c blue,green "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.build-all: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.start-all: concurrently -n be,fe -c blue,green "npm run backend:start" "npm run frontend:start"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
